comment:
* Utility class for storing a (user,PackageInfo) mapping.
 * @hide

methods.name: public static List<UserPackage> getPackageInfosAllUsers(Context context, String packageName, int packageFlags)
methods.comment:
* Returns a list of (User,PackageInfo) pairs corresponding to the PackageInfos for all
     * device users for the package named {@param packageName}.

methods.name: public boolean isEnabledPackage()
methods.comment:
* Returns whether the given package is enabled.
     * This state can be changed by the user from Settings->Apps

methods.name: public boolean isInstalledPackage()
methods.comment: * Return {@code true} if the package is installed and not hidden

methods.name: public static boolean hasCorrectTargetSdkVersion(PackageInfo packageInfo)
methods.comment:
* Returns whether the package represented by {@param packageInfo} targets a sdk version
     * supported by the current framework version.

methodNames: public static List<UserPackage> getPackageInfosAllUsers(Context context, String packageName, int packageFlags)
